item.title: MrsB 178 TC update
item.dc:creator: kjcardoza
item.description:
The Pats have been in camp for a full week. Here’s a quickie update of the happenings on the fields behind Gillette Stadium. See also http://patriotscampreports.com for my annual TC reports which include daily details. item.title: Patriots 2009 Schedule
item.dc:creator: kjcardoza
item.description:
New England Patriots 2009 Schedule Wk Date Matchup TV Time 1 Mon, Sept. 14 vs. Buffalo Bills ESPN 7 p.m. 2 Sun, Sept. 20 at New York Jets CBS 1 p.m. 3 Sun, Sept. 27 vs. Atlanta Falcons FOX 1 p.m. 4 Sun, Oct. 4 vs. Baltimore Ravens CBS 1 p.m. 5 Sun, Oct. 11 [...]

Post from: Mrs. B's Patriot World Podcast

Patriots 2009 Schedule
item.content:encoded:
New England Patriots 2009 Schedule
Wk Date Matchup TV Time
1 Mon, Sept. 14 vs. Buffalo Bills ESPN 7 p.m.
2 Sun, Sept. 20 at New York Jets CBS 1 p.m.
3 Sun, Sept. 27 vs. Atlanta Falcons FOX 1 p.m.
4 Sun, Oct. 4 vs. Baltimore Ravens CBS 1 p.m.
5 Sun, Oct. 11 at Denver Broncos CBS 4:15 p.m.
6 Sun, Oct. 18 vs. Tennessee Titans CBS 4:15 p.m.
7 Sun, Oct. 25 at Tampa Bay Buccaneers CBS 1 p.m.
8 Bye
9 Sun, Nov. 8 vs. Miami Dolphins CBS 1 p.m.
10 Sun, Nov. 15 at Indianapolis Colts NBC 8:20 p.m.
11 Sun, Nov. 22 vs. New York Jets CBS 4:15 p.m.
12 Mon, Nov. 30 at New Orleans Saints ESPN 8:30 p.m.
13 Sun, Dec. 6 at Miami Dolphins NBC 8:20 p.m.
14 Sun, Dec. 13 vs. Carolina Panthers FOX 1 p.m.
15 Sun, Dec. 20 at Buffalo Bills CBS 1 p.m.
16 Sun, Dec. 27 vs. Jacksonville Jaguars CBS 1 p.m.
17 Sun, Jan. 3 at Houston Texans CBS 1 p.m.

Post from: Mrs. B's Patriot World Podcast

Patriots 2009 Schedule
